Sentencas: This paper presents a thermal based modified dynamic model of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: The proposed fuel cell model involves ohmic, activation and concentration voltage losses, thermal dynamics, methanol reformer, fuel utilization factor and power limiting module.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: A power conditioning unit (PCU), which consists of a DC-DC boost converter and a DC-AC voltage-source inverter (VSI), their controller, transformer and filter, is designed for grid-connected systems.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: The voltage-source inverter with six Insulated Gate Bipolar Transistor (IGBT) switches inverts the DC voltage that comes from the converter into a sinusoidal voltage synchronized with the grid.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: The simulations and modeling of the system are developed on Matlab/Simulink environment.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: The performance of SOFC with converter is examined under step and random load conditions.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: The simulation results show that the designed boost converter for the proposed thermal based modified SOFC model has fairly followed different DC load variations.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: Finally, the AC bus of 400 Volt and 50 Hz is connected to a single-machine infinite bus (SMIB) through a transmission line.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: The real and reactive power managements of the inverter are analyzed by an infinite bus system.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems

Sentencas: Thus, the desired nominal values are properly obtained by means of the inverter controller.
Titulo: The modeling and simulation of thermal based modified solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for grid-connected systems
